title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct equation

f'(0) = -2

Tangent line is y = -2x + 3.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct equation

f'(0) = -2

Tangent line is y = -2x + 3.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct equation

f'(0) = -2

Tangent line is y = -2x + 3.
